listitem.para: Interface for a game deck that identifies the common functions of each type of deck.
Represents the open functionality that can be taken a GinRummyController class by other classes. The main purpose of this interface is to allow a mock controller to be used for testing purposes.

This IMeld represents melds (sets/runs) from the game, Gin Rummy. It provides the common functionality for the melds and allows them to be stored together in a collection. Implementing classes should make use of a private constructor.
Represents a subscriber object to be used with a notifier to receive updates.
